message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $95. I think it's a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $75 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little bit more, but $85 is my final offer.  If you're not interested, I'll have to move on to other potential buyers.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $85 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $82?
